sn11.17:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava divaviharagato hoti patisallino.
sn11.17:1.3: Atha kho sakko ca devanamindo brahma ca sahampati yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva paccekam dvarabaham nissaya atthamsu.
sn11.17:1.4: Atha kho sakko devanamindo bhagavato santike imam gatham abhasi:
